note: Retired gay guy. Interests include Equal Rights, UK politics (I’m left of centre) and animals / animal welfare. Strong believer in kindness. New to this format - followers welcomed.

name: Gay British guy and supporter of equal rights.
value: Hi, I’m a 61 year old happily married gay guy. I have two grown sons and a wonderful husband. I care passionately about equal rights and

name: Pro EU
value: The saddest day for me was when the UK left the European Union. I hope for a change of government in the near future which I hope will pave the way for a return to the European family of nations.

name: Languages
value: Currently learning Spanish and regard myself as an advanced beginner.

name: Work
value: I am a retired nurse. As my husband is also retired we can enjoy our time together. We enjoy walking and have two dogs.
